tweets.text:
Fantastic job by @ellen_halliday big round of applause.

As Ellen highlights the River Lea is in a shocking state, in reality it has become nothing more than a proxy for every other river in the country. Be warned.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/TzrlFTGT0L
@INRIXtraffic_SW @EnvAgencySW @SomersetCouncil Still closed at present - I'll check on when that's likely to change.

A groundwater flood alert has been issued for east Kent.

We are working extremely closely with the @EnvAgencySE @Kent_cc and @SouthernWater to tackle any problems that might come our way.

Full update: https://t.co/WmmGJa33p2 https://t.co/To6JzCRZyA

Flooding has a devastating impact on  people. So social research is really important. Here is the new #Landscapes2Lifescapes on-line exhibition on how flooding can affect us all at any age. @LancasterUni @UniOfHull @EnvAgency @ESRC https://t.co/hndczjPP1G

"Creating a better place for people and wildlife" is the strap line on @EnvAgency headed note paper. How does this statement fit with sewage discharges into the @RiverChess  on 89 days over the past 18 months. That is 16% of the time being exceptional, really?????

Weather Update: the #flood gate at #Morpeth has been closed this evening for precautionary reasons as we continue to monitor the weather forecast and water levels in the region. For the latest updates on flood alerts and flood warnings please visit https://t.co/tumDuoEmi2 https://t.co/fumpy31aWx

tweets.text:
Do you know how to protect your home from flooding?

For useful tips and stories read the updated Property Flood Resilience e-magazine: https://t.co/FeIt9Gpqy1 

#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/QC5FfuI6md

Don't drive through flood water!  
1. Just 30cm can float an average family-sized car 
2. It's the #1 cause of death during flooding 
3. Over ¬æ of cars rescued from floods have to be written off 
4. Just 1 egg-cup of water sucked into your engine will wreck it
@SurreyCouncil https://t.co/akYyRv35XV

tweets.text: Yes almost the moment water levels get to a respectable level we get to see a chalk stream that is until the sewage discharges start. A fleeting glimpse then it's gone. @EnvAgency https://t.co/HNHGAiNBV4

CHC have completed the installation of a 3 tier screen in Woodnook water, Accrington in challenging winter conditions as part of the @EnvAgencyNW Framework.

The screen will help protect the centre of Accrington from flooding for many years to come. https://t.co/kZUMmH3XAc

‚öñ Court Result following close #partnership working between @AnglingTrust, @DCFishEA & @DC_Police. Do you like Great Crested Newts?! ü¶é do you like ponds and are you in north #yorkshire?  If yes, would you like @YorksWildlife to install #GCN pond habitat in your park, garden or land for FREE?? If you‚Äôre interested please pm new for more details. @NewtPartnership https://t.co/MudCc8PCFS

Busy week for all our staff, keeping floodwaters at bay for communities all over England...

... and this is what we have been up to in the South East...
#floodaware https://t.co/H5MiPb4uXn https://t.co/rgd9XjdvDS

Illegal fishing endangers wildlife and fish stocks.

In East Anglia alone, our officers seized 52 illegal nets and traps between March and December last year.

If you see an illegal net or trap let us know by calling 0800 807060.

More info: https://t.co/LXS1yx3Qnm https://t.co/Rqr8TT3zrz

urls.title: South Korea unveils $43 billion plan for world's largest offshore wind farm
urls.description: South Korea unveiled a 48.5 trillion won ($43.2 billion) plan to build the world's largest wind power plant by 2030 as part of efforts to foster an environmentally-friendly recovery from the COVID-19 pandemic.

tweets.text: Finished filming in the Whiston Brook catchment for the Natural Flood Management film with members of the Facilitation Fund. NFM measures help to slow the flow of water, improve water quality and create wildlife havens. @picturestorypro @StaffsWildlife @NE_WestMids @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/nJ9MEQeDpi

A game angler has been convicted of fishing illegally following great partnership work involving an Angling Trust Volunteer Bailiff in support of @DCPoliceRural_D, @DC_Police and @DCFishEA ‚Äì Always make sure you have a valid @EnvAgency fishing licence - https://t.co/Tm1oL5iWjG

urls.title: Enforcement partnership nets dishonest game angler a conviction for illegally fishing on the River Exe - Angling Trust
urls.description: ¬† A game angler reported three times by a volunteer bailiff for fishing illegally has been ordered to pay fines and costs totalling ¬£419 and had his fishing tackle confiscated and destroyed. James Robert Lee, from Devon, appeared at Exeter Magistrates Court to face three charges of unlawfully attempting to take fish contrary to schedule [‚Ä¶]
